translations.chinese: 漢王從其計，出軍宛葉間，與黥布行收兵。
translations.english: King Han followed his plan, led troops out between Wan and Ye, and together with Ying Bu went to gather troops.

translations.chinese: 羽聞漢王在宛，果引兵南，漢王堅壁不與戰。
translations.english: Xiang Yu heard that King Han was at Wan and indeed led troops south. King Han fortified deeply and did not fight him.

translations.chinese: 是月，彭越渡睢，與項聲、薛公戰下邳，破殺薛公。
translations.english: In this month, Peng Yue crossed the Sui River and fought Xiang Sheng and Xue Gong at Xiapi, defeating and killing Xue Gong.

translations.chinese: 羽使終 公守成皋，而自東擊彭越。
translations.english: Xiang Yu had Zhong Gong defend Chenggao while he himself went east to attack Peng Yue.

translations.chinese: 漢王引兵北，擊破終公，復軍成皋。
translations.english: King Han led troops north, attacked and defeated Zhong Gong, and returned his army to Chenggao.
